title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Competencies: Advanced Project Management Practice Course: Construct-Aligned Short-Term

context.prior_knowledge: Basic project management terminology and work experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Integrate ≥3 risk management elements when establishing project plans based on PMI standard processes
Compare Agile/Waterfall methodologies and justify appropriate approaches for given scenarios
Conduct virtual project meetings using mobile team collaboration tools (e.g., Trello, Slack) in mobile environments
Develop and share personal project management competency plans based on formative assessment feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
